summary: REQ-1 and REQ-3 appear implemented in the shown LandModel.tsx traversal (biome-specific emissiveIntensity set before persisting baseEmissive; dithering enabled on all processed materials). REQ-2 (useFrame pulse logic using group.current.traverse and scaling emissiveIntensity = baseEmissive * pulse) is not evidenced in the truncated diff. The diff also includes modifications outside LandModel.tsx, which were not requested and conflict with the scope constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Refine the emissive pulse in LandModel.tsx so the useFrame loop uses group.current.traverse(...) and sets material.emissiveIntensity = material.userData.baseEmissive * pulse for meshes with baseEmissive defined.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided LandModel.tsx diff excerpt shows material setup and baseline storage, but does not show any useFrame implementation or group.current.traverse-based pulsing logic due to truncation; therefore implementation cannot be verified from the evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified additional files outside the requested scope (changes should be scoped to frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx only).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly require keeping changes scoped to LandModel.tsx, but the diff summary reports modifications to two other files.
